name: Bite Might
description:
In the deep caves. Bitey the Hungry Monster waits for it's next meal; just make sure it won't be his last!

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys to move,
  • Press the up key to jump over enemies,
  • Hit the A key to devourer your meals!

Notes:

  • This game was made for the Trijam #173 in under 3 hours.
  • The game was written in python and pygame (so no game engines used).
  • There may or may not be a few bugs.
  • The code is an absolute mess, but I've included it for viewing. (Viewers be warned! Spaghetti code is dangerous!)
  • I plan on expanding the game after the game jam ends, so stay tuned!
